donations.campaign_title: Help Sarah Fight Cancer - Medical Treatment Fund

campaigns.title: Help Sarah Fight Cancer - Medical Treatment Fund
campaigns.description: Sarah is a 32-year-old mother of two who was recently diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer. She needs funds for chemotherapy, surgery, and ongoing treatment. Her family is struggling to cover medical costs while she's unable to work.

updates.text: Thank you for all the support!

donations.campaign_title: Help Sarah Fight Cancer - Medical Treatment Fund

mcp_emails.subject: Alex, your kindness means everything to Sarah 💙
mcp_emails.body:
Dear Alex,

Your generous $100 donation to Help Sarah Fight Cancer has touched our hearts deeply. Knowing that compassionate people like you in San Francisco are standing with Sarah during her medical journey gives her and her family incredible strength and hope. Your gift will go directly toward her treatment costs, helping to ease the financial burden so she can focus entirely on healing. We're so grateful for your continued support of medical causes that truly change lives.

With heartfelt appreciation,

[Your Name]
[Organization Name]
The Giving Intelligence Team
